header.title: 1-on-1 Consultation with Asdita Prasetya
header.name: Asdita Prasetya
header.description: 10+ years of experience in the tech industry. Currently working remotely and teaching at several coding platforms.

discussionTopics.title: Web Development & Coding
discussionTopics.description: Have questions about architecture, tech stack, or how to start a new project? I can help you design the solution.

discussionTopics.title: AI-Assisted Development
discussionTopics.description: I actively use AI tools for development. If you want to learn how to maximize Claude, ChatGPT, or other tools to code faster, I can share my experience and tricks.

discussionTopics.title: Career & Remote Work
discussionTopics.description: Looking for direction in tech? Want to work remotely? Or thinking about a career change? I can share insights from my own journey.

discussionTopics.title: Stuck with a Specific Problem?
discussionTopics.description: Have a bug that's driving you crazy? Have code that needs review? Or a project you want to plan together? Let's discuss directly.

schedule.format: Video or voice call via Google Meet (you choose what's comfortable)

preparation: Questions or specific topics you want to discuss
If about a project: brief about what you're working on
If you have code to review: prepare the link or screenshot
Pen & paper or notes app‚Äîto note important points
benefits: Insights & advice directly from a practitioner
Concrete action plan you can implement immediately
Follow-up via chat if you need clarification
